sentences.english: Slavery was abolished in the United States after the Civil War.
sentences.chinese: 美國的奴隸制度自南北戰爭後就廢除了。

sentences.english: So I decided to test the system.
sentences.chinese: 因此我決定測試下這個制度。

sentences.english: The people's war has helped crush the feudal structure in the rural areas.
sentences.chinese: 人民戰爭摧毀了農村地區的封建制度。

sentences.english: Three generations of hereditary patriarchal system is rather profound social basis of Confucian culture.
sentences.chinese: 三代遺傳的宗法制度毋寧是儒家文化的深厚社會基礎。

sentences.english: Compared with the Ming dynasty, the system of selecting officials in Qing dynasty had a big change.
sentences.chinese: 比之明代，清代的選官制度有了較大改變。

sentences.english: At the cost balance point on the institutional margin, the allocation of power achieves Pareto Optimality.
sentences.chinese: 在制度邊際成本持平處權力的配置達到帕累托最優。

sentences.english: The Traditional Institutionalism investigated the history regarding institution as the focus.
sentences.chinese: 傳統制度主義以制度爲中心來考察歷史。

sentences.english: Objection to the jurisdiction is an important component of the jurisdiction system of civil litigation.

sentences.english: Because the existing system is based on having an enemy.
sentences.chinese: 因爲其現行制度是基於一個假想敵。

sentences.english: We will move forward with reform of the rural land management system in an orderly manner.
sentences.chinese: 有序推進農村土地管理制度改革。

sentences.english: We have abolished the system of exploitation of man by man.
sentences.chinese: 我們已經徹底廢除了人剝削人的制度。

sentences.english: The third part mostly introduces the legal system in the securities depository process.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分主要介紹了證券託管環節中的法律制度。
